4.3 DUIM-DCs Module

$hearts-stipple

Constant

Summary

A stipple pattern for use in creating a patterned brush that draws a heart shape.

Type

<array>

Library

duim-dcs

Module

duim-dcs

Description

A stipple pattern for use in creating a patterned brush that draws a heart shape.

See also

brush-stipple, page 130
